SELECT diagnosis.diagnosis_id, diagnosis.diagnosis_time, diagnosis.diagnosis_content, diagnosis.diagnosis_prescription, diagnosis.diagnosis_status, diagnosis.diagnosis_is_check, diagnosis.diagnosis_is_operation, diagnosis.appointment_id, appointment.appointment_id, appointment.appointment_time, appointment.appointment_status, appointment.patient_id, appointment.employee_id, appointment.branch_id, appointment.appointment_price, appointment.appointment_pay_time, patient.patient_id, patient.patient_phone, patient.patient_name, patient.patient_gender, patient.patient_identity, patient.patient_address, patient.client_id, branch.branch_id, branch.branch_name, branch.department_id, employee.employee_id, employee.employee_name, employee.employee_password, employee.employee_online, employee.employee_last_login_time FROM diagnosis JOIN appointment ON diagnosis.appointment_id = appointment.appointment_id JOIN patient ON appointment.patient_id = patient.patient_id JOIN branch ON appointment.branch_id = branch.branch_id join employee on appointment.employee_id = employee.employee_id WHERE diagnosis.diagnosis_status = '正在处理'
